title: Tim Burton exhibition archive
brief_description:
Contents:
The Installation of Balloon Boy (ed. Csilla Csongvay, 1 min, 21/6/2010)—The Installation of the Batmobile (ed. David Meagher, 2 min, 16/6/2010)—Thursday night Burton Club (ed. Csilla Csongvay, 1 min, 24/6/2010)—Installation of the Topiary Deer (ed. David Meagher,1 min 16/6/2010)—Flip book for ACMI Blog (ed. David Meagher, 1 min, 19/10/2010)—Headless Horseman (ed. David Meagher, 2 min, 6/7/2010)—Vox pops for ACMI Blog (ed. Richard Greenhalgh, 7 min, 16/9/2010)—Young Burton tour guides (ed. Jason White, 3 min, 22/6/2010)—Media launch (ed. David Meagher, 3 min, 23/6/2010)
